TEXT: Valar Morghulis. Card without this keyword will discard from deck after defeat a BOSS.
Remove from your deck after win.
Take effect after draw then disappear. Draw another card.
Return to draw pile when shuffle.
Reduce 1 damage taken each stack. The stacks reduce by half when shuffle.
At the end of turn, Deal damage equal to the count of your remaining card and give 1 Constricted to a random enemy each stack.
At the end of turn, Deal 1 damage to owner each stack.
